body: MLflow Recipes is part of MLflow 2.x. Can you try upgrading your client?

Hi Ben,
Thanks for your reply. I have installed 2.0 version only. The error is
coming in that version.
Regards
Subrata

changes. Skipping.

failed.
make (e=2): The system cannot find the file specified.

make: *** [Makefile:21: steps/split/outputs/train.parquet] Error 2
